## JSON to HTML Table

Online demo can be found [here](https://rodydavis.github.io/lit-html-table/).

- Json to HTML Table
- JSON from url
- Inline JSON
- No Dependencies
- Editable table
- Lit

<img width="100%" src="/doc/finished.png">

<img width="100%" src="/doc/editor.png">
